line_1: Heroes and worthies of days past, thy sires?
line_2: Or his, who touch'd their hearts with hallow'd fires?

line_1: The grateful country of thy sires,
line_2: Thee to severer toils thy fate requires:

line_1: To name an infant meet our village sires,
line_2: Assembled all as such event requires;

line_2: Bequeath you wealth, indulge the nobler fires:

line_1: The worst of Children to the best of Sires!
line_2: See how its Rage the young Numidian fires,

line_1: And counts the ocean's god among his sires;
line_2: Soon with wrong'd Albion's name the host she fires,

line_1: How best you may disgrace your prudent sires;
line_2: But would ye learn, ye leisure-loving 'squires,
